WAR DOG EXECUTIONER.equipped_with: This model is equipped with: diabolus heavy stubber; 2 War Dog autocannons; armoured feet. WAR DOG EXECUTIONERMethodical and coldly emotionless killers, Fallen Nobles who pilot War Dog Executioners employ long-barrelled, rapid-firing cannons to maximise their kills. They eviscerate throngs of the enemy and hammer the foes’ war engines into submission, seeking to reap ever greater murderous tallies than their peers.
